item.title: The best and worst engineering methods to stop COVID
item.description: Not all methods are created equal.

item.title: Comparing Masks and Ventilation/Filtration
item.description: What's more effective - a CR box in the classroom or everyone wearing a cloth mask? Here's how they can be compared.

item.title: In-Room vs Out-Of-Room Airborne Mitigation
item.description: Not all engineering methods to stop airborne spread are created equal. Some are better than others. It's better to clean the air in the room than cleaning the air entering the room. Here is why

item.title: Here's my number: 87.5%

item.description: What are they and what do they do?
